title: Brand Ult Bug
body: when playing as brand support the ult would not bounce to minions when they were ablazed EXAMPLE- ezreal beside all minions w wave and ezreal ult ezreal would only hit him and then cancel unless another champion is near

replies.body:
Hey lightside470! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and you should see a fix for this soon!
Same, another post came up recently about this.
